amendment.description: Amendment allows the VA to maintain its requirement of a veteran's preference on HUD-financed housing on VA campuses and prohibits use of funds in the bill toward enforcing any HUD rule which does not allow for veteran's preference in a facility built on a VA campus or which is built using a VA-enhanced use lease.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in part A of House Report 111-578 to prevent funds in the bill from being used to prohibit the establishment of any occupancy preference for veterans in supporting housing for the elderly that is assistance by HUD and is located on Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) property or is subject to an enhanced use lease with the VA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
